parameters.name: Logstore
parameters.description: The name of the Logstore that collects log data from Alibaba Cloud CDN in real time. You can specify multiple Logstore names and separate them with commas (,).

parameters.name: Project
parameters.description: The name of the Log Service project that is used for real-time log delivery. You can specify multiple project names and separate them with commas (,).

parameters.name: Region
parameters.description:
The ID of the region where the Log Service project is deployed. You can specify multiple region IDs and separate them with commas (,).

For more information about regions, see [Regions that support real-time log delivery](~~144883~~).
